relevant_findings.general: No acute distress, alert and oriented x3
relevant_findings.abdominal: Soft, non-distended, very tender to palpation in right lower quadrant with localized peritoneal signs, positive Rovsing's, negative psoas and obturator, no generalized peritonitis
relevant_findings.extremities: No calf tenderness or swelling, mild rash in intertriginous zones
